content: of heel size choose the smaller one for lower instep or slender feet choose the larger one for high instep and/or more substantial feet remove the stitch marker and then work then next stitches as follows for smaller heel only ktbl p1 k2togtw p1 ktbl twice p1 k2togtbl p1 ktbl p2tog k2togtbl p2tog ktbl p1 twice ktbl p2tog ktbl for larger heel only ktbl p1 k2togtw p1 ktbl twice p1 k2togtbl p1 ktbl p1 1-2rtw ktbl p1 3times ktbl p2tog ktbl ©caoua coffee 2016 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved coffee cantata v 1 1 page 3/16 coffee cantata socks - by caoua coffee continue for both heel sizes look at your work and check the last of the sts you just worked should be the first of the 2 stem stitches of that little fir tree at the ankles the former st nr 27 of the leg chart now put the next 46 sts of that round on hold they will be worked later for instep instep spans from the middle of one fir tree to the middle of the other the heel setup and heel is worked back and forth over the 40 43 sts you have still on the needles turn your work so ws is facing you now work the 2 4 row of the smaller larger heel setup chart you ll end with 35 39 sts on your needles heel flap ws sl yf k1 17 19 times sl yf turn rs ktbl p1 17 19 times ktbl turn work these two row 15 17 times all together i e 30 34 row total turn heel ws sl yf p19 21 p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb k6 6 ssk k1 turn ws sl yf purl to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb knit to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn repeat these last 2 row until all sts have been worked don t turn after last rs row now 21 23 heel sts remain gusset setup pick up and knit 16 19 sts along side of heel flap pick up one more st between flap and instep and knit it continue by knitting all the 46 held instep sts in instep pattern start at row 1 of instep chart then pick up 1 st between instep and heel flap and knit it pick up 16 19 more sts along side of heel flap and knit them knit the 38 43 other sole sts this is the new beginning of the round you now have 46 instep sts and 55 63 sole sts gusset decrease round 1 instep work instep in pattern as established i e work next row of instep chart sole ssk knit to 2 sts before instep k2tog round 2 work instep in pattern as established knit all sole sts work these 2 rounds 12 14 times i e 24 28 rounds total decreasing 2 sts every other round now there are 46
